description: Describes the details of a specific application.

nested_items.name: applicationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the application.

nested_items.name: applicationId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the application.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when this application was created.

nested_items.name: deployedVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the application that is deployed.

nested_items.name: applicationVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the deployed application.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the deployment.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the reported status.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the application.

nested_items.name: engineType
nested_items.description: The type of the target platform for the application.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the runtime environment where you want to deploy the application.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The identifier of a customer managed key.

nested_items.name: lastStartTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when you last started the application. Null until the application runs for the first time.

nested_items.name: latestVersion
nested_items.description: The latest version of the application.

nested_items.name: applicationVersion
nested_items.description: The application version.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the application version was created.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the application.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the reported status.

nested_items.name: listenerArns
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the network load balancer listener created in your Amazon Web Services account. Amazon Web Services Mainframe Modernization creates this listener for you the first time you deploy an application.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: listenerPorts
nested_items.description: The port associated with the network load balancer listener created in your Amazon Web Services account.
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: loadBalancerDnsName
nested_items.description: The public DNS name of the load balancer created in your Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: logGroups
nested_items.description: The list of log summaries. Each log summary includes the log type as well as the log group identifier. These are CloudWatch logs. Amazon Web Services Mainframe Modernization pushes the application log to CloudWatch under the customer's account.

nested_items.name: logGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the log group.

nested_items.name: logType
nested_items.description: The type of log.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the application.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role associated with the application.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the application.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the reported status.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: targetGroupArns
nested_items.description: Returns the Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the target groups that are attached to the network load balancer.
(string) ---
